info.title: TONG!
info.author: penduinbits
info.details: Tetris and Pong, in the same place, at the same time.  Enjoy lots of customizable gameplay options, and plenty of great music!  Play using the Wii Remote held sideways (NES-style).  Control the tetrads with +, 1 and 2, tilt to move the paddles.
